vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, first mentioned at Ezr.2.17
§ Bezai = "conqueror"
a chief of the returning exiles in the time of Ezra
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比賽 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "征服者"
以斯拉時期被擄歸回的一個首領
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
比赛 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "征服者"
以斯拉时期被掳归回的一个首领

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Exile and Return, only mentioned at Neh.10.18
§ Bezai = "conqueror"
a chief of the returning exiles in the time of Ezra
